import React, { Component } from "react" import { Button, Form, Header } from "semantic-ui-react" import { connect } from "react-redux" class NewUserForm extends Component { state = { username: "", name: "", password: "", location: "", bio: "", img_url: "", facebook_url: "", twitter_url: "", soundclound_url: "" } handleCreateNewUser = e => {} handleNewUserChange = e => { const targetValue = e.target.value const targetName = e.target.name this.setState({ [targetName]: targetValue }) } render() { console.log(this.state) return (
{/* TODO Add Socials & Images */} {/* */}
) } } export default connect( null, null )(NewUserForm)
